## Interpreting the Task  
- The task is to transform text to appear as if it's from "Xrelly-stack," a specific entity or style.  
- This involves changing the original text, which discusses Baileys (a library for WhatsApp Web API) now maintained by WhiskeySockets, to fit the new context.
</think>> [!CAUTION]
> NOTICE OF BREAKING CHANGE.
> 
> As of 7.0.0, multiple breaking changes were introduced into the library.

Xrelly-stack is a WebSockets-based TypeScript library for interacting with the WhatsApp Web API.

Join the Xrelly-stack community via the link: https://t.me/xrelly
